alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 5:10AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. Wind gusts as high as 45 mph Tuesday night. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snowfall will continue through Thursday morning with another significant snowfall possible Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
